# 小法故事多

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/xiaofa-gushiduo
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/xiaofa-gushiduo
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install xiaofa-gushiduo
xiaofa-gushiduo <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g xiaofa-gushiduo
xiaofa-gushiduo <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
